author: Paul Cullen
title: All staff and residents in nursing homes that had Covid-19 cases will be tested, says HSE
description: There are currently 335 outbreaks of virus in residential care settings
content:
All staff and residents in residential homes that have had confirmed Covid-19 cases are to be tested for the disease, the Health Service Executive has said.
The widening of testing is part of a scaling up of testing facilities where outbreaks have occurred, … [+2882 chars]
